name: ORGANIC ALL PINK BREAST CANCER AWARENESS BOOBEE SOAP ON A ROPE FOR CHARITY
description:
Have you or anyone you loved been affected by breast cancer? It's time to find a cure! I have created this perfect pink titty with 20% of its proceeds going directly to pinkribbon.org
Let's find a cure one titty at time:)

�INSPIRATION
To conquer breast cancer

�THE BENEFITS
This ALL NATURAL Shea Butter boobee soap has ORGANIC Honey and ORGANIC Bee's Wax in it so your skin & soul will thank you!. I added Peppermint essential oil to make this soap smell so yummy & it looks great! It is ALL NATURAL soap & does not contain detergents, surfactants, sulfates, alcohol, or sugar solutions (SLS Free). 

�SPECS
These boob's dimensions are 3" x 3" x 2.5" and have a whopping 8.5 oz of soap in it so it will last for a long time. Comes with a pink cotton rope & pink BCA ribbon
* PLease let me know if you would like soap with no rope.

�SHIPPING
Free Shipping only in Vancouver, BC! Just message me.

name: Hockey Puck Soap on a Rope - Organic Hemp/VEGAN/SLS-Free
description:
• HOCKEY PUCK SOAP ON A ROPE - Hemp Organic VEGAN SLS-Free
"HE SHOOTS HE SCORES"! For every winner, there needs to be a good soap to wash all that blood & sweat off after a game. I used to get made fun of by my teammates when I brought my girlfriend's soap to the post game showers, but now I am the envy of all of them! You'll for sure be the talk of the team when your 'sporting' one of these in the after game showers. All your teammates will want 'score' one of these too!

•HOW I MADE
Molded from an official NHL game puck. It's detail is so amazing you can even see & feel the grooves & NHL logo on the side of it! This puck is equipped with a black synthetic ROPE (dries fast) so there will never be any awkward 'dropping the soap in the team shower' moments.

I hand made this VEGAN, Super moisturizing, Great Lathering, Glycerin soap with ORGANIC HEMP SEED oil Sta Anise Essential oil (smells black licorice)! YES REAL ESSENTIAL OILS! This is much better for you and better than fragrance. 

•SIZE
Dimensions are 3" x 3" x 1" & is 4.25 oz

name: Big Daddy Gunz Soap on a Rope - Organic Hemp Oil
description:
•BIG WHITE GUN SOAP on A ROPE VEGAN & ORGANIC HEMP  
James Bond for sure was packing this in his shower. 
All your friends will have something to say when they see one of these in your bathroom! Get clean in style with these BIG SIZED Big Daddy Gunz. I have this hanging up in my own shower & every morning I have a shower, I start the day off with a SMILE - I can't help it :)

•HOW I MADE THIS ORIGINAL 
This is an ORIGINAL DESIGN that I HANDMADE by making a silicone mould. I hand pour each soap - Great Quality. BE THE ONLY ONE OUT THERE WITH THIS Premium soap!! I poured it in 2 stages - thats how I got the 2 colors in it. This is not those small gun soaps-THIS IS A BIG 3D design! Both sides with gun detail.

•THE BENEFITS
These All Natural & Healthy Gunz I made with Shea Butter soap then I added ORGANIC Hemp Seed Oil (mega moisturizing) with Peppermint Essential oil- You'll smell great & feel energized after shooting all that dirt off of you in the shower!

•SPECS
Dimensions are 6" x 4" x 1" and it is approx. 7 oz of soap.
It is ALL NATURAL soap & does not contain detergents, surfactants, sulfates, alcohol, or sugar solutions (SLS Free)- Your skin & soul will thank you!

name: Rugged Black Grenade Soap on a Rope
description:
•BLACK GRENADE SOAP on A ROPE VEGAN
"Fire in Da hole! Kaboom!" Blast all that dirty stuff off of you with this pineapple grenade! I handmade this from a silicone mould Made of super moisturizing All Natural Vegan Glycerin soap, Star Anise Essential oils that smells like black liquorice & colored with natural black nickel oxide . Don't let this soap fool you, it's made of the best ingredients. This will be the best & most fun soap you will ever have!!

•FOR WHO?
Great for that guy/boyfriend or hubby, kids, Bad boy,bad-ass, or military person you know- Also great for those who had a hard day and want to relieve their sore muscles!
This looks great in the bathroom sink & you will always get good comments on it from your guest-trust me:)-I love having this one hang out in our bathroom!

•SIZE
Dimensions are 4" x 2.5" x 2" & is approx. 3.25 oz of soap.

name: Bad Ass black Soap Skull on a Rope
description:
BLACK SKULL SOAP on A ROPE VEGAN, ALL NATURAL, ESSENTIAL OILS
Here is a High End Dark & Mysterious Bad Ass Skull Soap I made from a silicone mould -Pretty original! Made of super moisturizing Vegan Glycerin soap, Star Anise Essential oils that smells like black liquorice & colored with natural black nickel oxide . Don't let this soap fool you, it's made of the best ingredients & will relieve you of sore muscles at the end of the day. 

•FOR WHO?
Great for Halloween, kids, goth, punk, Bad boy,bad-ass, or naughty person you know;) Also great for those who feel a little sluggish- This will getcha goin!!
This looks great in the bathroom sink & you will always get good comments on it from your guest-trust me:)-I love having this one hang out in our bathroom!
 * If no rope options picked I will leave it without rope like in picture*

•STATS
Dimensions are 2.5" x 2.5" x 2" & approx. 4.5 oz of soap.
